Performer:
Yoshida Kazusuke (吉田和右)

Dates: '1982-'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.


Performances as Puppeteer:

October 1983: A Tragic Love Triangle

December 1984: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu

February 1985: The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo

May 1985: The Battles of Genji and Heike

July 1986: The Yaguchi Ferry

January 1987: A Tragic Love Triangle

August 1987: Madame Butterfly

September 1987: The Battle of Sakamoto Castle

November 1987: The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo
